remarks: Weaker version of ~ equsalh (requiring distinct variables) without using ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Nov-2015.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 28-Dec-2017.)
statement:
equsalhw.1 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
equsalhw.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
equsalhw $p |- ( A. x ( x = y -> ph ) <-> ps ) $.
$d x y $.
